headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC): Exploring Valuation as Market Calms After Recent Volatility
summary: If you have been watching Norfolk Southern (NSC) lately, you might be curious about where the railroad operator is heading next. While there has not been any major event shaking up the headlines, the stock’s recent movement may have you wondering whether the market is signaling a shift in how investors value this company. Norfolk Southern has seen its share price dip slightly over the past month, but the bigger picture tells a different story. Gains from earlier in the year are still holding...
